title: [Celanthil's General Store]
[Celanthil's Magic Shoppe]
[Celanthil's Weaponry]
description: Beneath an elegantly arched fel ceiling, a gold and crimson wyvern tapestry hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A gold-veined black marble counter sits in one corner while a wyvern painted ivory vase rests on the golden oak floor.
